TopicTitle: Is there a way to get older versions of ksp?

Articles.Content:
Hello, i have been looking for older versions of ksp. I have found links but none works. I was hoping that someone knows any links that works and if you know one, please tell me. 

Thank you

Is this:

what you're looking for?

I'm not sure if the links work though, some people have been reporting problems.

UPDATE: The links aren't working right now, but they will be back. Not sure when though. In the meantime, there's no way to get those old versions.
